channel.title: Knocking You Friends Out Funny but DANGEROUS
channel.description:
ok get your friend you want to knock out to breath in out and deeply and fast so he goes all dizzy
then stand him up against a wall and push REALLY HARD on his chest were his heart is
after a while he will just collapse, then you can beat him up and he wont know as when he wakes up he wouldnt of felt anything
some guys did it at my school they woke up ok
but i dont suggest you doing it as its VERY DANGEROUS
disclaimer: i am not responsible if your stupid enough to do this and your friend gets into hospital or something THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS and should only be done by stupid people

item.title: Knocking You Friends Out Funny but DANGEROUS

item.description:
@Martin wrote:

I used to do it alot to people and draw on thier faces while KO

mr candy:

i got the best way…grab a very very large hammer…the rest if self explanatory

LOL

item.title: Knocking You Friends Out Funny but DANGEROUS
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

[quote=“anon95490785, post:1, topic:16948”]Right, well actually I’ve done this in a different way. Breath in and out extremely fast, then just hold your breath for a little while. We used to do this when we were like 10 and didn’t know anything, maybe thats why I started using drugs instead, they are ebtter for you. THis really causes brain damage.

But when you woke up after your 1 minute coma, you’d feel really releaxed and it was a similar feeling as being drunk. But sometimes if you only passed out for 1 second, or enough to fall down, then you’d have the most painful headache in the world for about 20 seconds. [br][size=1]Posted at: October 03, 2006, 06:26:22 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Mmmk link=topic=25330.msg286681#msg286681 date=1159918305]
Not funny.
[/quote]

Still funnier then peeling bananas though ;)[/quote]
Peelings bananas is pretty funny though ;).

Read full topic
